extension.name: Exchange Server Client Access Performance Monitor

metric.name: Availability Requests (sec)
metric.description: Shows the number of requests serviced per second. The request can be only for free/busy or include suggestions. One request may contain multiple mailboxes.

metric.name: Application Restarts
metric.description: Shows the number of times the application has been restarted during the Web server's lifetime.

metric.name: Worker Process RestartsMyMetric3
metric.description: Shows the number of times a worker process has restarted on the computer.

metric.name: Requests Current
metric.description: Shows the current number of requests, including those that are queued, currently executing, or waiting to be written to the client. Under the ASP.NET process model, when this counter exceeds the requestQueueLimit defined in the processModel configuration section, ASP.NET will begin rejecting requests.

metric.name: Request Wait Time
metric.description: Shows the number of milliseconds the most recent request was waiting in the queue.

metric.name: Requests In Application Queue
metric.description: Shows the number of requests in the application request queue.

metric.name: Average Time to Process a Free Busy Request
metric.description: Shows the average time to process a free/busy request in seconds. One request may contain multiple mailboxes. Free/busy responses do not have meeting suggestions.

property.value: Average Time to Process a Free Busy Request

metric.name: Average Response Time
metric.description: Shows the average time (in milliseconds) that elapsed between the beginning and end of an OEH or ASPX request.

metric.name: Average Search Time
metric.description: Shows the average time that elapsed while waiting for a search to complete.

metric.name: Average Request Time
metric.description: Shows the average time that elapsed while waiting for a request to complete.

metric.name: Requests/sec
metric.description: Shows the number of HTTP requests that are received from the client via ASP.NET per second.

metric.name: Ping Commands Pending
metric.description: Shows the number of ping commands that are currently pending in the queue.

metric.name: Sync Commands/sec
metric.description: Shows the number of Sync commands that are processed per second. Clients use this command to synchronize items within a folder.

metric.name: Current Unique Users
metric.description: Shows the number of unique users currently logged on to Outlook Web Access. This value monitors the number of unique active user sessions, so that users are only removed from this counter after they log off or their session times out.

metric.name: Download Task Queued
metric.description: Shows a value of 1 if the task is queued for execution, otherwise shows 0.

metric.name: Download Tasks Completed
metric.description: Shows the number of OAB download tasks completed since the File Distribution service started. The default value is every 480 minutes or 8 hours.

metric.name: NSPI RPC Browse Requests Average Latency
metric.description: Shows the average time in ms, that NSPI browse requests took to complete.

property.value: NSPI RPC Browse Requests Average Latency

metric.name: NSPI RPC Requests Average Latency
metric.description: Shows the average time in ms, that NSPI requests took to complete.

metric.name: Referral RPC Requests Average Latency
metric.description: Shows the average time in ms, that referral requests took to complete.

metric.name: Outbound Proxy Requests - Average Response Time
metric.description: Shows the average time in ms, that requests sent to a secondary client took to complete.

property.value: Outbound Proxy Requests - Average Response Time

metric.name: Requests - Average Response Time
metric.description: Shows the average time in ms, the Exchange control panel took to respond.

metric.name: Sync Commands Pending
metric.description: Shows the number of sync commands that are currently pending in the queue.

metric.name: ActiveSync Current Requests
metric.description: Shows the number of HTTP requests waiting to be assigned to a threa d.

metric.name: OWA Requests/sec
metric.description: Shows the number of requests handled by OWA.

metric.name: AutoDiscover Requests/sec
metric.description: Shows the number of AutoDiscover requests.

metric.name: Get Requests/sec
metric.description: Shows the number of requests processed each second. This determines current user load.

metric.name: Post Requests/sec
metric.description: Shows the number of requests processed each second. This determines current user load.

metric.name: Current Connections
metric.description: Shows the number of connections established with the web service.

metric.name: Connection Attempts/sec
metric.description: Shows the number that connections with the web service are attempted.

metric.name: Active User Count
metric.description: Shows the number of active users in last 2 minutes.

metric.name: User Count
metric.description: Shows the number of users connected to the service.

metric.name: RPC Operations/sec
metric.description: Shows the rate at which RPC operations occur.

description.value: When monitoring servers running Microsoft Exchange Server with the Client Access role installed
